author: apsallid
body:
#### PR description:

We update scripts we use for the regularly announced release validation campaigns due to the recent PR #31695, so that multiclusters could be correctly placed in the hgcal validation webpage. 

#### PR validation:

We have tested that they work without problems with the ongoing 11_2_0_pre7_phase2 validation campaign. 

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This is not a backport. 

@rovere @felicepantaleo @lecriste @ebrondol
title: [HGCAL] Updating RelVal campaign scripts
